description.en: A lecture on the modules and architecture of ESRI's ArcGIS. Six tutorials using ArcGIS Desktop and its extensions form the core of this course and should be completed as prerequisite for consideration.
description.et: Ülevaatekursus  ArcGIS-ist. Kuus praktikumi üksikkasutaja töölauaversiooni (ArcGIS Desktop) ja tema laiendustega.

objectives.en: To gain an overview of the structure of ArcGIS software, to become familiar with its basics and to obtain first practical skills of using it in order to continue with self-instruction according to one's own needs.
objectives.et: Saada ülevaade ArcGIS'i üldisest ülesehitusest ning omandada lähtealus iseseisvaks edasiõppimiseks. Saada esmane praktiline kogemus nimetatud tarkvaraga  ning erinevas formaadis geograafiliste andmetega töötamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: After successful passing the student will be able to:
- understand the basics of ArcGIS and coordinate systems;
- understand the character of interoperability of geographic information;
learning_outcomes.et: - tunneb ArcGIS-i kasutamise loogikat ja oskab kasutada koordinaatsüsteeme

learning_outcomes.en: - create and manage a geodatabase, edit a spatial data;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab luua ja hallata geoandmebaasi, muuta ruumiandmeid

learning_outcomes.en: - present data clearly using maps, charts, and reports;

learning_outcomes.et: - oskab koostada lihtsamaid programme Model Builderis

learning_outcomes.en: - continue with self-instruction according to one's own needs.
learning_outcomes.et: - on võimeline ennast isesiseisvalt antud valdkonnas täiendama

independent_work.et: 6 labs, details are in the Moolde

description.et:
The course is passed if:
1. tests are 90% correct
2. all results of labs are submitted and accepted (grade in Moodle is "passed")

grade_preconditions.et: Results of exercises must by submitted into Moodle on the deadline

debt_elimination.et: Final deadline of all submissions is 9. october at 9.00

description.et:
1. Lab - User Interface
2. Lab - Coordinate systems. Attributes
3. Lab - Editing
4. Lab - Queries
5. Lab - Map Design
6. Lab - Model Builder

audience.et: master students of the programme 'Geoinformatics for Urbanised Society'
